channel.title: cant open steam
channel.description:
Hi I installed black mesa yesterday and was able to open the game to the main menu. I turned it off then because didnt have time to play but this morning I cant open steam, its just stuck in my taskbar and doesnt expand when clicked on.
Ive tried playing the game directly through steam/steamapps etc but this has not worked.....
any ideas would be appreciated....

item.title: cant open steam
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Have you tried forcing the steam process to close with the task manager? If that doesn’t work try restarting your PC.

Read full topic
